import "./calculator.css"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Calculator() { const [sum, setSum] = useState('') const clickHandler = (e) => { // console.log(e.target.value) setSum(e.target.value) } return ( <>
{sum}
    {clickHandler(e)}}>
